exam.stem: Artificial Intelligence is about ______.Aplaying computer gamesBmaking robotsCprogrammingDmaking an intelligent machineD
What can AI NOT enable machines to do?ASelf-improveBSelf-understandCSelf-learnDSelf-thinkD

What is Artificial Intelligence?AArtificial Intelligence is a field that aims to improve the security.BArtificial Intelligence is a field that aims to develop intelligent machines.CArtificial Intelligence is a field that aims to mine the data.DArtificial Intelligence is a field that aims to make humans more intelligent.B
Which of the following applications is NOT related to computer vision?AFace recognitionBStreet view understandingCAutonomous drivingDSpeech understanding and synthesisD
